contents.text: Welcome to Kissmetrics, where we help you understand user behavior and engage customers every step of the way.
To explore our analytics solutions and see how behavior-based engagement can drive your growth, press 1.
For information about pricing and service plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a Kissmetrics pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and plan options for Kissmetrics to choose the right tier quickly.
Get pricing details for Kissmetrics analytics plans to budget for my veteran-run small business
Compare pricing tiers and calculate ROI for Kissmetrics analytics service plans.
Ask for details on service plans, pricing, and any available discounts.
I want details on pricing tiers and service options so I can budget for analytics in my research.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Kissmetrics product demo at the earliest available slot.
Schedule a personalized demo to see how Kissmetrics can help my veteran nonprofit track user engagement
Schedule a personalized demo focusing on cohort analysis and behavior-based segmentation workflows.
Schedule a live demo so someone can walk me through using the analytics tools.
I’d like to schedule a personalized product demo to see how your platform could support my student projects.

contents.text: For assistance with your current Kissmetrics account or technical questions, press 2.
For help setting up analytics tracking and understanding your data, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Get assistance setting up analytics tracking and understanding my initial data.
Get help setting up analytics tracking on my website and interpreting the data for my veteran support initiative
Get help setting up event-tracking API integration and configuring dashboard metrics.
Connect me to technical support to help set up tracking and explain my data reports.
I need assistance configuring analytics tracking on my site and interpreting the data for my experiments.

contents.text: For billing and account management inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update my billing information and clarify the latest invoice charges.
Clarify a billing discrepancy on my Kissmetrics account related to last month’s charge
Update billing info, review invoice details, and adjust my subscription plan.
Review my latest invoice and update my payment information.
I need help with my account billing—reviewing recent charges and updating my payment method.
